results.name: default/wordpress-86d97b9f6-ppqq9

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-86d97b9f6-ppqq9], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service has no ready endpoints because the pod 'wordpress-86d97b9f6-ppqq9' is not ready, but 1 is expected.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs wordpress-86d97b9f6-ppqq9`. 3. Verify readiness probe configuration. 4. Ensure pod dependencies are available.
